Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: appId
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The application identifier (as specified in the Channels developer dashboard).

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The application key (as specified in the Channels developer dashboard).

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The application secret (as specified in the Channels developer dashboard).

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: encryptionMasterKey
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The master key used for server-side encryption operations.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: cluster
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The Pusher cluster that hosts the Channels application

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: httpProxy
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: A HTTP proxy to use when routing traffic to a custom host.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: port
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The port to use when routing traffic to the host.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: scheme
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The scheme to use when routing traffic to the host.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.name: useTLS
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: Whether or not Transport Layer Security is used when

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: Creates a PusherClientOptions instance using the default set of configuration options

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: Creates a PusherClientOptions instance from a collection of configuration options.

Structs/WebhookEvent.html#/s:6Pusher12We.name: channel
Structs/WebhookEvent.html#/s:6Pusher12We.abstract: The channel relating to the Webhook event.

Structs/WebhookEvent.html#/s:6Pusher12We.name: socketId
Structs/WebhookEvent.html#/s:6Pusher12We.abstract: The identifier of the socket that sent the event (only set if eventType is clientEvent).

Structs/WebhookEvent.html#/s:6Pusher12We.name: userId
Structs/WebhookEvent.html#/s:6Pusher12We.abstract: The user identifier associated with the socket that sent the event

Structs/Webhook.html#/s:6Pusher7WebhookV.name: createdAt
Structs/Webhook.html#/s:6Pusher7WebhookV.abstract: The Date that Pusher servers originally created the Webhook request.

Structs/Webhook.html#/s:6Pusher7WebhookV.name: events
Structs/Webhook.html#/s:6Pusher7WebhookV.abstract: The events contained within the Webhook request.

Structs/PresenceUserData.html#/s:6Pusher.name: userId
Structs/PresenceUserData.html#/s:6Pusher.abstract: The user identifier to send as part of a generated AuthenticationToken.

Structs/PresenceUserData.html#/s:6Pusher.name: userInfo
Structs/PresenceUserData.html#/s:6Pusher.abstract: An optional additional user data dictionary to send as part of a generated AuthenticationToken.

Structs/PresenceUserData.html#/s:6Pusher.abstract: Creates an instance of PresenceUserData for use when generating an AuthenticationToken.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV8cha.abstract: The channels to which the event will be sent (if publishing to multiple channels).

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV7cha.name: channel
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV7cha.abstract: The channel to which the event will be sent (if publishing to a single channel).

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV4dat.name: data
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV4dat.abstract: This is the Data representation of the original data parameter of either of the init(...) methods.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV8soc.name: socketId
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV8soc.abstract: A connection to which the event will not be sent.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV4nam.abstract: Creates an event to be triggered on a specific Channel.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV4nam.name: init(name:data:channels:socketId:attributeOptions:)
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Pusher5EventV4nam.abstract: Creates an Event which will be triggered on multiple Channel instances.

Structs/ChannelInfo.html#/s:6Pusher11Cha.name: isOccupied
Structs/ChannelInfo.html#/s:6Pusher11Cha.abstract: The channel is classed as occupied if there is at least one user subscribed to it.

Structs/ChannelAttributes.html#/s:6Pushe.name: subscriptionCount
Structs/ChannelAttributes.html#/s:6Pushe.abstract: The number of all connections currently subscribed.

Structs/ChannelAttributes.html#/s:6Pushe.name: userCount
Structs/ChannelAttributes.html#/s:6Pushe.abstract: The number of distinct users that are currently subscribed.

Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.name: userCount
Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.abstract: The number of distinct users that are currently subscribed.

Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.name: subscriptionCount
Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.abstract: The number of all connections currently subscribed.

Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.name: all
Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.abstract: All available attributes for the occupied channel. (i.e. [.userCount, .subscriptionCount]).

Structs/Channel.html#/s:6Pusher7ChannelV.name: init(fullName:)
Structs/Channel.html#/s:6Pusher7ChannelV.abstract: Creates a Channel based on a full name (including type prefix).

Structs/Channel.html#/s:6Pusher7ChannelV.name: init(name:type:)
Structs/Channel.html#/s:6Pusher7ChannelV.abstract: Creates a Channel based on a shortened name and a channel type.

Structs/AuthenticationToken.html#/s:6Pus.name: signature
Structs/AuthenticationToken.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The authentication signature for the channel subscription attempt.

Structs/AuthenticationToken.html#/s:6Pus.name: userData
Structs/AuthenticationToken.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The String representation of any PresenceUserData that was provided

Structs/AuthenticationToken.html#/s:6Pus.name: sharedSecret
Structs/AuthenticationToken.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: A Base-64 encoded shared secret String used for decryption.

Structs/AuthenticationToken.html.name: AuthenticationToken
Structs/AuthenticationToken.html.abstract: A token that contains an authentication signature that can be used when users

Structs/Channel.html.name: Channel
Structs/Channel.html.abstract: A channel that can be queried for information, or be published to using an Event.

Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.name: ChannelAttributeFetchOptions
Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.abstract: Attributes of an occupied Channel that can be fetched from the Pusher HTTP API.

Structs/ChannelAttributes.html.name: ChannelAttributes
Structs/ChannelAttributes.html.abstract: Channel attributes that can be fetched depending on the ChannelAttributeFetchOptions

Structs/ChannelSummary.html.name: ChannelSummary
Structs/ChannelSummary.html.abstract: A summarised information record for an occupied Channel.

Structs/Event.html.name: Event
Structs/Event.html.abstract: An event to trigger on a specific Channel (or multiple channels).

Structs/PresenceUserData.html.name: PresenceUserData
Structs/PresenceUserData.html.abstract: User data required when generating an AuthenticationToken for a subscription attempt to a presence channel.

Structs/User.html.name: User
Structs/User.html.abstract: An information record for a specific user currently subscribed to a presence Channel.

Structs/Webhook.html.name: Webhook
Structs/Webhook.html.abstract: A representation of a Webhook that contains an array of events related to changes

Structs/WebhookEvent.html.name: WebhookEvent
Structs/WebhookEvent.html.abstract: An event that is contained within a received Webhook.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html.name: PusherClientOptions
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html.abstract: A collection of configuration options for a Pusher Channels HTTP API client.

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: channelOccupied
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A Channel has become occupied. (i.e. there is at least one subscriber).

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: channelVacated
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A Channel has become vacated. (i.e. there are no subscribers).

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: memberAdded
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A User has subscribed to a presence channel.

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: memberRemoved
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A User has unsubscribed from a presence channel.

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: clientEvent
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A client event has been triggered on a private or presence channel.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: clientSide
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The URLRequest could not be initialized with a valid URL.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: decodingError(_:)
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The response body could not be decoded to the specified type.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: encodingError(_:)
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The request body could not be encoded to the specified type.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: failedResponse(statusCode:errorResponse:)
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The server returned a failed response indicated by a non-successful HTTP statusCode.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: unexpectedResponse
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The server returned a response that was not a HTTPURLResponse.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: errorDescription
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: A localized human-readable description of the error.

Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:6Pusher11Chann.name: init(fullName:)
Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:6Pusher11Chann.abstract: Creates a ChannelType whose value is inferred based on a full channel name.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.name: any
Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.abstract: A filter that returns any channel that can be subscribed to.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.name: custom(prefix:)
Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.abstract: A custom filter, based on a provided channel name prefix string.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.name: encrypted
Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.abstract: A filter that returns all occupied encrypted channels.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.name: private
Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.abstract: A filter that returns all occupied private channels.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.name: presence
Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.abstract: A filter that returns all occupied presence channels.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html.name: ChannelFilter
Enums/ChannelFilter.html.abstract: A filter that may be applied when fetching information on an occupied Channel

Enums/ChannelType.html.name: ChannelType
Enums/ChannelType.html.abstract: The available channel types for a Pusher Channels application.

Enums/PusherError.html.name: PusherError
Enums/PusherError.html.abstract: An error encountered whilst using the Pusher Channels HTTP API Swift library.

Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC7option.name: init(options:)
Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC7option.abstract: Creates a Pusher Channels HTTP API client configured using some PusherClientOptions.

Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC5users3.abstract: Fetches an array of User records currently subscribed to a given occupied presence Channel.

Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC7trigge.abstract: Triggers an Event on one or more Channel instances.

Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC7trigge.name: trigger(events:callback:)
Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC7trigge.abstract: Triggers multiple events, each on a specific Channel.

Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC13verif.abstract: Verifies that a received Webhook request is genuine and was received from Pusher.

Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC12authe.name: authenticate(channel:socketId:userData:callback:)
Classes/Pusher.html#/s:6PusherAAC12authe.abstract: Generates an authentication token that can be returned to a user client that is attempting

Classes/Pusher.html.abstract: Manages operations when interacting with the Pusher Channels HTTP API.
